long_description: With fun style, the Krash kids' bike helmet offers protection for developing riders. Helmet's fun-styled molded shell covers an inner layer of protective expanded polystyrene (EPS) foam for impact protection. 6 vents allow cool, fresh air to circulate over and around child's head. Adjustable straps allow an easy fit. Please note: fits heads 21.2 - 22.8 in. (54 - 58cm) in circumference.
short_description: With fun style, the Krash kids' bike helmet offers protection for developing riders.
